UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the oob application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity, matches Firebase Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

readingList.description: Array of article IDs that the user has saved to their reading list.

Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents an article or post in the oob application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Article entity, auto-generated by Firestore.

authorId.description: Reference to UserProfile ID (Firebase Auth UID).

summary.description: Brief summary or excerpt of the article.

createdAt.description: Date and time the article was published (Firestore server timestamp).

imageId.description: ID for the article's hero image.

tags.description: Keywords associated with the article for search.

likeCount.description: Number of likes the article has received.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Path-based ownership ensures that only the authenticated user can access their own profile. The 'userId' parameter corresponds to the Firebase Auth UID.
Stores article data. Open to the public for reading, but only the author can edit/delete based on the 'authorId' matching the request.auth.uid.
